languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} unleashes a terrifying scream, drawing the attention of their enemies and becoming a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: After killing an enemy or dealing a Critical Hit with a melee attack, the Fighter screams at their enemies and becomes a priority target for those who fail a Willpower Test.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} unleashes a terrifying scream, drawing the attention of their enemies and becoming a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
The Fighter screams at their enemies to draw their attention and becomes a priority target of any enemy who fails a Willpower Test.

Воин издает клич, чтобы привлечь внимание противников, и становится приоритетной целью для каждого противника, который провалит проверку Воли.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}发出令人心惊胆战的咆哮，吸引周围敌人的注意力。未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}的敌人会将战士视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，持续三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} suelta un grito aterrador, llamando la atención de sus enemigos y convirtiéndose en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de cualquier enemigo que falle una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} unleashes a terrifying scream, drawing the attention of their enemies and becoming a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} suelta un grito aterrador, llamando la atención de sus enemigos y convirtiéndose en {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de cualquier enemigo que falle una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} schreit seine Feinde an, um ihre Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, und wird 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} aller Gegner, deren {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} misslingt.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} unleashes a terrifying scream, drawing the attention of their enemies and becoming a {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for any enemy who fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Krieger schreit seine Feinde an, um ihre Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, und wird zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} eines jeden Feindes, dem eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} misslingt.

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} pousse un hurlement terrifiant qui attire l'attention de ses ennemis et devient ainsi la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de tous ceux qui ratent leur {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
